message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, but I think I can do better than that. How about a slightly more generous offer?
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, but I still think I deserve more
You're still not willing to give me a fair share? I'll try to be more generous, but I expect more in return.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much. This is my best offer so far
I'm starting to think you're not serious about splitting it fairly. I'll take a bigger share, but I'll still be generous.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. This is my last offer before I walk away
